content:
#27562 deduplicates/standardizes the meta code for a piece of logic which appears in ring_nf, abel_nf, norm_num, push_neg and reduce_mod_char: use a Simp.Result to modify a hypothesis or goal.

@Michael Rothgang and @Eric Wieser have each reviewed parts of it but aren't comfortable with or don't have time to review the whole. I'd be glad if someone else picked this up.
